title: Please ID this typeface for me.
content:
Hello,

Can someone please help me identify the typeface used on this webites identity and in its copy pages:

I imagine its the same family just different weight, between the intro and the other pages.

[http://www.telenor.se/valkommen/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091213032024/http:/www.telenor.se/valkommen/ "http://www.telenor.se/valkommen/")

Thank you in advance.

Lukas
author: Lukas.D

comments.content:
Itâ€™s Telenor, a custom font family:

[http://www.melkeveien.no/magnus-rakeng/telenor.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20091213032024/http:/www.melkeveien.no/magnus-rakeng/telenor.html "http://www.melkeveien.no/magnus-rakeng/telenor.html")
